title: Build a Full-Stack Trello Clone with Next.js 14
summary: A comprehensive tutorial on building a feature-rich Trello clone using the latest Next.js features, including server actions, drag-and-drop functionality, and database integration with Supabase.

title: Create a 3D Portfolio with Three.js
summary: Learn how to build a stunning interactive 3D portfolio website from scratch using Three.js and GSAP for animations. A great way to showcase your creativity.

title: Python for Everybody - Full University Course
summary: A complete university-level course on Python programming, perfect for beginners. Covers all the fundamental concepts from variables to data structures and web scraping.

title: Build a Discord Bot with Node.js
summary: This tutorial walks you through creating a powerful Discord bot using Node.js and the Discord.js library. You'll learn how to handle commands, events, and more.

title: iOS 17 & Swift 5: Complete iOS App Development
summary: Dive into iOS app development with Swift 5 and SwiftUI. This course covers everything from the basics to advanced topics like Core Data and ARKit.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms for Beginners
summary: A clear and concise introduction to essential data structures and algorithms using JavaScript. Perfect for interview preparation and strengthening your foundational knowledge.

title: Figma UI/UX Design Tutorial for Beginners
summary: Learn the fundamentals of UI/UX design using Figma. This tutorial covers everything from wireframing and prototyping to creating a full design system for a web application.

title: Flutter Course for Beginners â€“ 37-hour Cross-Platform App Development
summary: An epic, in-depth course on Flutter app development. Build beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.
